snippet: With mass transit still being restored and a number of uncertainties surrounding New York and New Jersey after Hurricane Sandy, the Nets may not sell out their opener in Brooklyn.
lead_paragraph: With mass transit still being restored and a number of uncertainties surrounding New York and New Jersey after Hurricane Sandy, the Nets may not sell out their opener in Brooklyn.

headline.seo: Nets Uncertain of What Delayed Home Opener Will Bring
headline.main: Nets Uncertain of What Delayed Home Opener Will Bring
headline.print_headline: Nets Unsure Of What Opener Will Bring
